price: ከየሕዝቡም ሁሉ መስካሪን የምንቀሰቅስበትን ቀን (አስታውስ)፡፡ ከዚያም ለእነዚያ ለካዱት (ንግግር) አይፈቀድላቸውም፡፡ እነሱም በወቀሳ አይታለፉም፡፡
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَبۡعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤۡذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nabʿathu min kulli ummatin shahīdan thumma lā yu'dhanu lilladhīna kafarū walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
translations: will be asked to make amends
